Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Rear Guard Breakage hazard. Plastic guard can shatter, creating projectiles (~1.4M Units). Models: DWS779, DWS780, DHS790.

Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Fire Hazard. Varistors damaged by voltage fluctuations could overheat/smolder. Models: KS 88, KS 120. EU/AU markets.

Title: Recall
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Recall**: Motor Mount Cracking. Casting defect allowed motor to break free (Models 36-422L/412C).

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Handle Disintegration. Rubberized handle structural failure (MS1290 series).

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Laser Module Failure. Wiring vibration causes laser to fail prematurely (C10FCH series).

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Guard Return Spring. Weak spring causes guard to stay open after cut (SM2507LW).

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Blade Guard Sticking. Guard mechanism can jam and require manual intervention (GCM12SD).

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Detent Plate Wear. Soft aluminum detent plate wears out, causing inaccurate angle settings (LS1219L). Also fence kickback reports.

Title: Defect
Safety_Incidents_Notes: **Defect**: Brake System Failure. Multiple user reports of brake failing after months of use (2739-20). No official recall.
